citation: Thomas, K. W., & Kilmann, R. H. (1974). Thomas-Kilmann Conflict Mode Instrument.
note: Sample items representing each of the five TKI conflict-handling modes, based on published instrument descriptions.

items.text: I try to find a position that is between the other person's and mine
I try to find solutions that satisfy everyone's needs
I am usually firm in pursuing my goals
I try to do what is necessary to avoid tensions
I might try to soothe the other's feelings and preserve our relationship
I try to win my position in a dispute
I try to postpone the issue until I have had some time to think it over
I give up some points in exchange for others
I will let the other person have some of their positions if they let me have some of mine
I try to show the other person the logic and benefits of my position
